## ComponentBuilder class

ComponentBuilder is used to build a component from a ComponentInterface and return a BuildResultInterface with the result.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ComponentBuilder 
```

## Example

const componentBuilder = new ComponentBuilder(); const result = componentBuilder.build(component); if (result.success) { // do something with the result }
